about_the_game:
The first book in the Kranz series

Story:




In the world after the Great Silence, in the land of Kranz, automated sanctuaries that operate day and night in the subterranean world of defunct cities.



The young girl who wakes from her cold, dormant cabin, the memory of the war shattered to pieces... A doubtful reality.



Should have been awakened to a new life, but now it is barren.



Interdependent with the only girl in this desolate world, summon the courage to go to the earth to seek other survivors before the war...



The invisible "chord" between her and me resonated in the dead silence.

Type:


A fine skit, single-line visual novel that opens the series, kapttue Kranz (Broken Wreath) has about two hours of gameplay. We tried to create this work with the popular Japanese painting style and Japanese dubbing.



On the background we first attempted to render a 3d rendering with the model to achieve the sci-fi flavor of the overhead world setting.

Game Features:




Cute Japanese characters



Snow village う さ ぎ painted exquisite painting with CG

Nine exquisite pieces of music by professional orchestras

A thought-provoking worldview and relationship between characters

CV: Virtual yuan dubbing



A post-apocalyptic attachment worth recalling

Staff




First Main creator -Nanaza



Second Mian Creator - 奈茉甘夏



Script-Nanaza



Script Assistance & Translation - Chen xing xing



Character voice - Xu Yuan



Graphics - な



Background-Xrzllect



Preview Video-眼鏡ロボットさん



Program-Anleeos & 冷热可可对冲



Character design and drawing - 雪村うさぎ@pokapoka_18

The first book in the Kranz series

Story:




In the world after the Great Silence, in the land of Kranz, automated sanctuaries that operate day and night in the subterranean world of defunct cities.



The young girl who wakes from her cold, dormant cabin, the memory of the war shattered to pieces... A doubtful reality.

Interdependent with the only girl in this desolate world, summon the courage to go to the earth to seek other survivors before the war...



The invisible "chord" between her and me resonated in the dead silence.

A fine skit, single-line visual novel that opens the series, kapttue Kranz (Broken Wreath) has about two hours of gameplay. We tried to create this work with the popular Japanese painting style and Japanese dubbing.



On the background we first attempted to render a 3d rendering with the model to achieve the sci-fi flavor of the overhead world setting.

name: Kaputte Kranz Chap1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 or better
  • Processor: intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx650 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Kapputte kranz chap1 ,descibe a story of interdependence after the "great silence" World War , the hero wakes up for some reason, and meets the mysterious girl who is still sleeping. The prologue of a story of attachment to the world in the future.
